sources.title: King of The Britons | Full Movie | Action Adventure
sources.description:
King of The Britons - After King Vortigern and his people are betrayed and ambushed at a peace conference, he barely escapes and finds himself outside of a small British cottage. After being taken in and nursed to health, The King realizes that his people were being mistreated by the very people he put in charge to look after them. From that moment on, he vowed to set his people free from tyranny, no matter what the cost.
2021.  Stars: Jezibell Anat, Ronald Blanton, Damian Bush

metadata.Plot: Arthur - King of the Britons features actor Richard Harris, who portrayed Arthur in the film Camelot.He tries to unravel the story of the mythical king Arthur, using live action and computer graphics.He travels throughout the British Isles visiting legendary locations such as Arthur's birthplace in Tintagel, Cornwall.He also tries to find the mythical Isle of Avalon, where Arthur is said to have been buried.Camelot is also recreated as are the battlefields where he won his greatest victories.All together a well presented documentary with some very nice graphics.
metadata.Actors: Richard Harris, Francis Pryor, John Hines
